Questions.question:
A train travelling with a constant speed crosses a 
96-metre long platform in 12 seconds and another 
141-metre long platform in 15 seconds. The length 
of the train and its speed are (R.R.B., 2006)

options.d:
84 metres and 60 km/hr
PROBLEMS ON TRAINS 617
